A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie radically changes everything! I loved it but that is why it is getting mixed reviews from fans. It makes a clean break from the other movies and charts it’s own course. If you love are looking for more of the same old Star Wars\, you will have a hard time with this movie. If you are excited about new possibilities\, then you will love it. Search your feelings...trust the Force.
